BoardCertification.name: BoardCertification
BoardCertification.description: Represents the practitioner's board certifications such as being board-certified in cardiology and cardiovascular disease.

AccountId.description: Account that this healthcare provider is associated with.

BoardName.description: Name of the organization providing the board certification.

CurrentCertificationDate.description: Date of most recent board certification.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date from which this certification is effective.

EffectiveTo.description: The date on which this certification is no longer effective.

ExpirationDate.description: Expiration date of the board certification.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PractitionerId.description: Practitioner that this certification is associated with.

SourceSystem.description: System from which the record was sourced.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: ID of the system from which the record was sourced.
